Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 在行動網頁上顯示影像。

span.span: Displays an image on a mobile Web page.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法來選擇裝置特性為基礎的映像檔案。The class provides a way to choose an image file based on device characteristics. 針對特定裝置，您可以指定內建映像使用`symbol`： 一部分中的 URL 前置詞屬性。For certain devices, you can specify built-in images by using a `symbol` : prefix as part of the URL in the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱裝置的特定區段。For more information, see the Device-Specific section of the . > [!NOTE] > 如果您的應用程式依賴無 cookie 工作階段，或可能會收到要求從瀏覽器需要無 cookie 工作階段，使用波狀符號 ("\~」) 之路徑中不小心導致建立新的工作階段，可能會遺失工作階段資料。If your application relies on cookieless sessions, or might receive requests from browsers that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde ("\~") in a path can inadvertently result in creating a new session and potentially losing session data. 若要設定路徑的屬性，例如 ("\~/path")，解析路徑使用("\~/path") 再將它指派給屬性。To set a property with a path such as ("\~/path"), resolve the path using ("\~/path") before assigning it to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例程式碼示範如何使用[ \](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/k20acyeh(v=vs.85))影像控制項來指定不同的映像，為不同的裝置內的控制項。The following code sample code shows how to use a [\](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/k20acyeh(v=vs.85)) control within an Image control to specify different images for different devices. 如果您擁有足夠的檔案，名為 Sunshine.gif，它會出現在 Internet Explorer 中。If you have available a file named Sunshine.gif, it will appear in Internet Explorer. 如果您檢視網頁等特定為 OpenWave phone WML 裝置或 CHTML 裝置上時，它會顯示為 sun 圖示。If you view the page on a WML device such as an OpenWave phone or a CHTML device, it will appear as a sun icon. 瀏覽器的名稱和映像的已解析的名稱，也會顯示頁面。The page also displays the name of the browser and the resolved name of the image. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileImageSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileImageSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] 以下是``一節`Web.config`檔案。The following is the `` section of the `Web.config` file.

summary.span: 取得或設定當影像無法供裝置使用時要顯示的替代文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text to display when an image is not available for the device.

summary.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

value.span: 當影像無法供裝置使用時要顯示的替代文字。

span.span: The alternate text to display when an image is not available for the device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 替代的文字會出現在瀏覽器不支援映像或映像檔不提供。The alternate text appears in browsers that do not support images or where the image file is not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由使用各種裝置提供的一組內建的圖片，例如核心、 陽光、 一本書，向右箭號，並依此類推，因為[ \](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/k20acyeh(v=vs.85))控制項中控制項，您可以提供各種不同的圖形，可以整合到裝置本身，以及標準的 Web 圖形。Because various devices provide a set of built-in pictures, such as images for a heart, sunshine, a book, a right arrow, and so on, by using a [\](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/k20acyeh(v=vs.85)) control within the control, you can provide a wide variety of graphics that can be integrated into the devices themselves, as well as standard Web graphics. 例如，您可以指定`symbol:63726`作為WML 標記和 Sunshine.gif 為需要的所有裝置的屬性值HTML 裝置的屬性值。For example, you can specify `symbol:63726` as the property value for all devices that require WML markup, and Sunshine.gif as the property value for HTML devices. 確切的解析度映像配接器所提供值 (例如， ，或)。The exact resolution of the value is provided by an image adapter (such as , , or ). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用``控制項中控制項以指定不同的映像，為不同的裝置。The following code example shows how to use a `` control within an control to specify different images for different devices. 如果使用名為 Sunshine.gif 的檔案，它會出現在 Internet Explorer。If a file named Sunshine.gif is available, it will appear in Internet Explorer. 如果您檢視網頁等特定為 OpenWave phone WML 裝置或 CHTML 裝置上時，它會顯示為 sun 圖示。If you view the page on a WML device such as an OpenWave phone or a CHTML device, it will appear as a sun icon. 瀏覽器的名稱和映像的已解析的名稱，也會顯示頁面。The page also displays the name of the browser and the resolved name of the image. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileImageSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileImageSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] 以下是``Web.config 檔案區段。The following is the `` section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的應用程式依賴無 cookie 工作階段，或可能會收到要求從瀏覽器需要無 cookie 工作階段，使用波狀符號 ("\~」) 之路徑中不小心導致建立新的工作階段，可能會遺失工作階段資料。If your application relies on cookieless sessions, or might receive requests from browsers that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde ("\~") in a path can inadvertently result in creating a new session and potentially losing session data. 若要設定路徑的屬性，例如 ("\~/path")，解析路徑使用("\~/path") 再將它指派給屬性。To set a property with a path such as ("\~/path"), resolve the path using ("\~/path") before assigning it to the property.

span.span: The text displayed for a softkey when the image has a property defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性僅用於支援螢幕鍵盤的裝置。This property is used only for devices that support softkeys. 如果這個屬性是空的`Text`使用控制項的屬性。If this property is empty, the `Text` property of the control is used. 如果`Text`屬性是空的或長度為小於 9`Text`屬性用於螢幕鍵盤標籤。If the `Text` property is empty or its length is less than 9, the `Text` property is used for the softkey label.
